mapper.select: select t.clue_id, t.clue_name, t.pz_type, c1.value_desc pz_type_name, t.pz_type_detail, c2.value_desc pz_type_detail_name, t.clue_source, t.clue_desc, f.att_id, f.bus_id, f.att_name, f.att_path, t.CREATE_BY, t.CREATE_DT, t.CLUE_AUXILIARY from pz_t_clue_info t, fdi_t_attach f, SY_T_CODEVALUE c1,SY_T_CODEVALUE c2 where t.clue_id = f.bus_id(+) and t.pz_type = c1.code_value and t.pz_type_detail = c2.code_value and c1.type_id = '1002' and c2.type_id = '1007' and t.pz_id = #{pzid} order by decode(t.act_by_type,'B','1',to_number(t.act_by_type)), f.create_dt
mapper.update:
update case_info t set
t.jq_no=#{jqNo},
t.case_Ajly=#{caseAjly},
t.case_Type_Imp=#{caseTypeImp},
t.case_Status=#{caseStatus},
t.incident_Place=#{incidentPlace},
t.accept_Unit=#{acceptUnit},
t.lat_X=#{latX},
t.lon_Y=#{lonY},
t.incident_Date=to_date(#{incidentDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
t.case_type=#{caseType} where t.case_id=#{caseId}
mapper.delete: delete from fdi_t_attach a where a.bus_id in (select clue_id from pz_t_clue_info where pz_id=#{pzid})
mapper.select: select username,mobile_phone mobilePhone from au_t_user where user_id in (${ids})

select u.user_id, u.username from AU_T_USER u left join au_t_user_role ur on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.delete_by is null and ur.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and u.dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.clue_id, t.clue_name, t.pz_type, t.pz_type_detail, t.clue_source, t.clue_desc, t.CREATE_BY, t.CREATE_DT, t.CLUE_AUXILIARY, t.CLUE_SUMUP, m.service_request from pz_t_clue_info t join PZ_T_SERVICE_MANAGE m on t.pz_type_detail=m.uuid where t.pz_id = #{pzid} order by t.clue_id

select t.clue_id, t.clue_name, t.pz_type, t.pz_type_detail, t.clue_source, t.clue_desc, t.CREATE_BY, t.CREATE_DT, t.CLUE_AUXILIARY, t.CLUE_SUMUP, k.PZ_MAIN_ACCEPT, k.CREATE_BY, m.service_request from pz_t_clue_info t join PZ_T_SERVICE_MANAGE m on t.pz_type_detail=m.uuid join PZ_T_APPLY k on k.pz_apply_id = t.pz_id where t.pz_id = #{pzid} order by t.clue_id
